sentences.en: In this sense, the Chicxulub crater is the crucible of human evolution.
sentences.cn: 从这个角度来说, 奇虚乐陨石撞击事件可说是人类演化的推手.

sentences.en: Lava boiled up from the crater of the volcano.
sentences.cn: 熔岩从火山口里滚滚喷出.

sentences.en: Mauna Loa awoke from a 25 year silence in July 1975, filling its summit - pit crater with lava.
sentences.cn: 莫纳罗亚火山在1975年7月又从沉睡了25年的状态下苏醒过来了, 山顶上的火山口充满了熔岩.

sentences.en: Most of the crater is formed by ejection.
sentences.cn: 大多数的弹坑是由于把泥土抛出而形成的.

sentences.en: Orebodies zonal distribution are strictly controlled by crater structure.
sentences.cn: 矿体严格受火山口构造控制.

sentences.en: Scientists study the crater, but few tourists ever see it.
sentences.cn: 科学家来此研究, 很少见过游客来过这个陨石坑.

sentences.en: Smoke puffed up from the crater of the volcano.
sentences.cn: 烟从火山口一阵阵地喷出.

sentences.en: The depth of the crater is expected to be about 30 feet.
sentences.cn: 弹坑的深度预计约于30英尺.

sentences.en: The lava will just ooze gently out of the crater.
sentences.cn: 岩浆就会从火山口缓缓涌流出来。

sentences.en: The reasons of crater and action mechanisms of antifoaming agents were analysized.
sentences.cn: 分析了缩孔产生的原因,消泡剂的作用机理并介绍了预防缩孔的措施.

sentences.en: The relationship between crater and temperature distribution on the surface hasbeen obtained.
sentences.cn: 得到了表面凹陷与表面温度分布的关系.

sentences.en: What caused this unusual looking crater floor on Mars?
sentences.cn: 火星这个奇特的陨石坑底到底是怎麽形成的?

sentences.en: When a large object impacts the Earth, it makes a crater.
sentences.cn: 当巨大物体撞击地球时，就会产生凹坑。

sentences.en: With a telescope you can see the huge crater of Ve - suvius.
sentences.cn: 用望远镜你能看到巨大的维苏威火山口.

sentences.en: With a telescope you can see the huge crater of Vesuvius.
sentences.cn: 用望远镜你能看到巨大的维苏威火山口。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 火山口形成的深湖

trans.tran_cn: 火山口，喷火口，弹坑，[天文学]巨爵座，（月球上的）环形山
trans.tran_en: a round hole in the ground made by something that has fallen on it or by an explosion
